sections.title: Agriculture
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under IAS 41.

items.question: Does the entity disclose the aggregate gain or loss arising during the current period on initial recognition of biological assets and agricultural produce?
Does the entity disclose the aggregate gain or loss arising from the change in fair value less costs to sell of biological assets?
Does the entity disclose a narrative description of each group of biological assets?
Does the entity disclose a quantified description of each group of biological assets?
Does the entity elect to provide a quantified description of each group of biological assets distinguishing between consumable and bearer biological assets?
Does the entity elect to provide a quantified description of each group of biological assets distinguishing between mature and immature biological assets?
Does the entity disclose the basis for making any such distinction?
Does the entity describe the nature of its activities involving each group of biological assets?
Does the entity disclose non-financial measures or estimates of the physical quantities of each group of biological assets at the end of the period?
Does the entity disclose non-financial measures or estimates of the physical quantities of the output of agricultural produce during the period?
Does the entity disclose the existence and carrying amounts of biological assets whose title is restricted?
Does the entity disclose the carrying amounts of biological assets pledged as security for liabilities?
Does the entity disclose the amount of commitments for the development or acquisition of biological assets?
Does the entity disclose financial risk management strategies related to agricultural activity?
Does the entity provide a reconciliation of changes in the carrying amount of biological assets between the beginning and the end of the current period?
Does that reconciliation include other changes?
Does the entity disclose the nature and amount of material items of income or expense that result from climatic, disease, or other natural risks?
Does the entity elect to disclose the amount of change in fair value less costs to sell included in profit or loss due to physical changes?
Does the entity elect to disclose the amount of change in fair value less costs to sell included in profit or loss due to price changes?
If biological assets are measured at cost less depreciation and impairment because fair value cannot be measured reliably, does the entity disclose a description of those biological assets?
Does the entity explain why fair value cannot be measured reliably?
Does the entity disclose the range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie, if possible?
Does the entity disclose the depreciation method used?
Does the entity disclose the useful lives or depreciation rates used?
Does the entity disclose the gross carrying amount and the accumulated depreciation (aggregated with accumulated impairment losses) at the beginning and end of the period?
Does the entity disclose any gain or loss recognised on disposal of biological assets measured at cost less depreciation and impairment?
Does the reconciliation include increases due to purchases?
Does the reconciliation include decreases due to sales and biological assets classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5?
Does the reconciliation include decreases due to harvest?
Does the reconciliation include increases resulting from business combinations?
Does the reconciliation include net exchange differences arising on translation of the financial statements?
Does the reconciliation include impairment losses included in profit or loss?
Does the reconciliation include reversals of impairment losses included in profit or loss?
Does the reconciliation include depreciation included in profit or loss?
Does the reconciliation include other changes?
If fair value becomes reliably measurable during the current period, does the entity disclose a description of the biological assets?
Does the entity disclose an explanation of why fair value has become reliably measurable?
Does the entity disclose the effect of the change?
Does the entity disclose the nature and extent of government grants recognised in the financial statements?
Does the entity disclose any unfulfilled conditions and other contingencies attaching to government grants?
Does the entity disclose significant decreases expected in the level of government grants?
